text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
author: John Johnson

text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
author: Cory House

text: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
author: Kent Beck

text: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
author: Thomas Fuchs

text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

text: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
author: Ralph Johnson

text: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
author: Harold Abelson

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.'
author: Lebron James

text: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it
author: Rafiki - The Lion King

text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life
author: Muhammad Ali

text: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
author: Bruce Wayne/Batman - Batman Begins

text: Theory will only take you so far.
author: Ernest Lawrence - Oppenheimer

text: I would rather die of passion than boredom
author: Vincent van Gogh

text: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are
author: Kurt Cobain

text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist, that is all
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it
author: Peter Drucker
